news.title: Disney dominated the 2025 box office. Here's how it could keep the crown in 2026
news.summary: Disney accounted for 27.5% of the domestic box office's overall annual haul. It looks to be a dominant force in 2026, too.

news.title: Trump floats new tariffs in push to acquire Greenland
news.summary: The comments show Trump considering applying his aggressive tariff strategies to his efforts to acquire Greenland. The comments also show that Trump is considering using his tariffs to try and get more of Greenland.

news.title: Hassett pivots to possible 'Trump cards' amid credit card interest rate battle with banks
news.summary: Trump called for banks to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. The idea has been roundly rejected by industry executives and their lobbyists this week.

news.title: The founders of billion-dollar AI startups are getting younger — here’s why
news.summary: Experimenting in the age of AI "counts as more important than traditional corporate experience," Antler's co-founder Fridjtof Berge says.

news.title: Trump tells Hassett he wants to keep him where he is; Warsh Fed chair odds jump
news.summary: Trump said he'd prefer to keep Hassett in his position as top economic advisor. Trump, without explicitly stating his decision, said Hassett would be a good choice for the job.

news.title: We plan to retire at 62 and have $1 million, plus my wife’s pension and Social Security. Do we have enough to retire early?
news.summary: “We have no debt,” he says. “We’re not in debt. We’ve got no debt.”

news.title: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old. How do I do deal with interfering relatives?
news.summary: “I don’t want to step on any toes,” he says. “I’m not a big fan of stepping on anyone’s toes”

news.title: ‘I had hoped the virus would be contained in China’: An inside look at the Fed’s historic fight to save the U.S. economy
news.summary: Senior Federal Reserve officials were in a good mood in January 2020. But danger was brewing on the other side of the world. The U.S. was in the midst of a global financial crisis at the time.

news.title: I started working as a dishwasher at age 13. Social Security refuses to acknowledge this. Am I being cheated?
news.summary: “I am 69, and started collecting Social Security when I was 66½,” he says. “I started taking Social Security at the age of 66½.”

news.title: This group of tech stocks screams opportunity after a bewildering selloff
news.summary: A meltdown in software stocks has left several high-growth names trading at bargain prices, according to some on Wall Street. The shares of software companies have fallen by as much as 40 percent since the start of the year.
